name: Brass Poppy Drawer Pulls - Set of 4
description:
These adorable (and hefty) little poppy pods are an easy way to personalize your world. Cast in solid brass and finished in 3 different patinas, they were created from a hand carved wax model in Brooklyn, and sand cast in India. Sets of 4

3 Finishes available:
Antique Brass
Antique Bronze
Antique Nickel

Size is 1"Ø X 1" with assembly hardware included

name: Brass Poppy Door Knocker
description:
Cast in solid brass, these botanical themed knockers are created with a poppy flower back plate, and opium pod strike. What began as a hand carved wax model in Brooklyn, then sand cast in India, results in timeless design.

Made in 3 finishes to match your door hardware:
Antique Nickel
Antique Brass
Antique Bronze

Size is 3.75" W x 7.25"H x 2"D. All hardware for installation / instruction is included

name: Happy Pill Carryall Pouch - Large
description:
This little zippered carryall has a soft wool and cashmere front showing a single multicolored pill and is perfect place to stash small items. Each pill is a randomly chosen but brightly colored capsule, and is felted into the base fabric to give it a 3-dimensional look.

Two color options:
Multicolor on Dove grey w/ White faux leather back
Mulitcolor on Charcoal Grey w/ Black faux leather back

Size is 6.5" x 9".

name: Heart and Banner Tattoo Pillow - 12" x 20"
description:
The inspiration for this design came from the process of felting being so similar to tattooing. Fibers are manually embedded into the base fabric using needles and a wet felting process. This heart and banner is almost the quintessential tattoo, usually with Mom written on the banner, but initials or dates can be added to customize as well.

12” x 20” pillow, the design itself is roughly 4" x 5". The back is either black or bown linen held with a single button closure. 

A note on care: these can be hand washed in cool water (air dry flat) or dry cleaned if the occasion requires

Feather and down insert included

name: X-Ray Skull - Black & White
description:
An X-Ray profile is rendered onto a wool and cashmere base fabric using loose wool fibers. I use both needle and wet felting methods to "paint" the image onto the base fabric, creating a slightly raised, tactile design. The design itself is roughly 6" x 6", and framed in geometric stitching in White

Back is Black Linen held with a single button closure. 

18” x 18” square / feather and down insert included

A note on care: these can be hand washed in cool water (air dry flat) or dry cleaned if the occasion requires

name: Geometric Grey & Gold Rectangular Pillow
description:
A freeform orange starburst is needle and wet feted into a base fabric of Charcoal grey. The geometric design in dark Gold is embroidered over, framing the image. 

Back is a Slate Grey linen, single button closure. Feather / down insert included

14" x 24"

name: Moravian Star - 12 x 20 Decorative Pillow
description:
These 12" x 20" pillows have an abstract starburst embedded into the base wool and cashmere fabric, and then a 6 point star is embroidered on top in thread as a final step.

Two color options:
Grey background with Black & White design
Brick background with Grey and Black design

Each design is both needle and wet felted into the base fabric, and now I'm adding another dimension with embroidery and I'm ridiculously smitten with it. Back is a grey linen held with a single button closure

Feather / down inserts included

name: X-Ray Skull - Red
description:
An X-Ray profile is rendered onto a wool and cashmere base fabric using loose wool fibers. I use both needle and wet felting methods to "paint" the image onto the base fabric, creating a slightly raised, tactile design. The design itself is roughly 6" x 6", and framed in geometric stitching in Metallic Gold

Back is Slate Grey Linen held with a single button closure. 

18” x 18” square / feather and down insert included

A note on care: these can be hand washed in cool water (air dry flat) or dry cleaned if the occasion requires

name: Moravian Star - 16" Decorative Pillow
description:
These 16" x 16" pillows have an abstract starburst embedded into the base wool and cashmere fabric, and then a 6 point star is embroidered on top in thread as a final step.

Two color options:
Grey background with Black & White design
Brick background with Grey and Black design

Each design is both needle and wet felted into the base fabric, and now I'm adding another dimension with embroidery and I'm ridiculously smitten with it. Back is a grey or slate linen held with a single button closure

Feather / down inserts included

name: Greatest Hits - Happy Pills
description:
Consider your search for a soft place to rest your head while popping pills - or just dreaming of the days when you did - officially over. This happy trio of multicolored pills is applied to a super soft cream wool and cashmere fabric. In Buttercream or Black. Held with a single button closure with Tan, Grey or Black linen on the back to compliment the front.

Each pillow has a slightly different and random arrangement of colors making each unique. Akin to the long list of "possible side effects" you just never know quite what you're going to get......

These designs are applied to the fabric using a combination of wet and dry felting - a very labor intensive process that is not unlike tattooing the fabric with fibers instead of ink. It creates a slightly raised, tactile design.

12” x 20” (30.5 x 51cm) 

A note on care: these can be hand washed in cool water (air dry flat) or dry cleaned if the occasion requires

name: Brass Poppy Drawer Pull
description:
These adorable (and hefty) little poppy pods are an easy way to personalize your world. Cast in solid brass and finished in 3 different patinas, they were created from a hand carved wax model in Brooklyn, and sand cast in India. 

3 Finishes available:
Antique Brass
Antique Bronze
Antique Nickel

Size is 1"Ø X 1" with all assembly hardware included

name: Heart and Banner Tattoo Pillow - 16" Square
description:
The inspiration for this design came from the process of felting being so similar to tattooing. This heart and banner is almost the quintessential tattoo, usually with Mom written on the banner, but initials or dates can be added to customize.

16” x 16” pillow, the design is roughly 4" x 5" in White and Red felted onto a Black wool and cashmere fabric. The back is black linen held with a single button closure. 

A note on care: these can be hand washed in cool water (air dry flat) or dry cleaned if the occasion requires

Feather and down insert included

name: Swallow Tattoo
description:
Considering that needle felting is so similar to tattooing, it was a perfect match to reproduce an image of a classic flash tattoo onto a pillow. 

Two color options:
Sepia, red and blue on a Cream background
White, red and blue on a Black Background

Backs are either Brown or Black Linen held with a single button

Size shown is 16" x 16" with feather / down insert.

A note on care: these can be hand washed in cool water (air dry flat) or dry cleaned if the occasion requires

name: Geometric Grey & Gold Tech Case
description:
These padded tech cases have an orange abstract starburst embedded into the base wool and cashmere fabric, and a geometric frame in dark gold is embroidered on top in thread as a final step.

Orange poly lined, with black zipper, Grey fabric backs

Size is 8.5" x 11" x .75"

name: Geometric Grey & Gold Mini Tech Case
description:
These padded tech cases have an orange abstract starburst embedded into the base wool and cashmere fabric, and a geometric frame in dark gold is embroidered on top in thread as a final step.

Orange poly lined, with black zipper, Grey fabric backs

Size is 6.75" x 9" x .75"

name: Happy Pill
description:
To compliment the trio of pills on the Greatest Hits pillow, a single pill is featured on this small accent pillow. The design is applied to a super soft cream wool and cashmere buttercream fabric, and given a 3D modeled effect. Held with a single button closure, back is in Tan or Grey Linen.

While each pillow has a slightly different arrangement of colors making each unique, you may also specify general color combinations.

These images are applied to the fabric using a combination of wet and dry felting - a very labor intensive process that is not unlike tattooing the fabric with fibers instead of ink. This results in a slightly raised, tactile design.

14” x 14” Square. Feather and down insert.

A note on care: these can be hand washed in cool water (air dry flat) or dry cleaned if the occasion requires

name: Kiss Mini Tech Case
description:
A set of red lips are felted into the base Tan wool and cashmere fabric, creating a shaded 3D effect.

Lined with Orange poly, and backed in a Brown and Black distressed synthetic leather. Trimmed in grosgrain with zipper closure. These are padded to protect your iPad and there's even room for most slim protective skins if you use one. Fits the Mini iPad & Kindle

Size is 6.75" x 9" x .75"

name: Geometric Square Pillow
description:
With this design, a freeform starburst is needle and wet feted into a base fabric of wool and cashmere, and then finished with geometric embroidered frame. At once both cosmic and 'mathy'

16" x 16"

Two colorways available:
* Grey, Orange & Gold
* Grey, Wine & Metallic Silver

Back are grey linen, single button closure. Feather / down inserts included

name: Thin Line Mini Tech Case
description:
In this very minimal design, a single White line is felted into the base wool & cashmere fabric in Black. As the fibers are added in manually, you end up with a raised, tactile design

Lined with Orange poly, and backed in a Grey wool and cashmere fabric. Trimmed in grosgrain with zipper closure. These are padded to protect your iPad and there's even room for most slim protective skins if you use one. Fits the Mini size iPad & Kindle

Size is 6.75" x 9" x .75"

name: Kiss Tech Case
description:
A set of red lips are felted into the base Tan wool and cashmere fabric, creating a shaded 3D effect.

Lined with Orange poly, and backed in a Brown and Black distressed synthetic leather. Trimmed in grosgrain with zipper closure. These are padded to protect your iPad and there's even room for most slim protective skins if you use one. Fits the standard size iPad

Size is 6.75" x 9" x .75"

name: Starburst Decorative Pillow
description:
Cosmic goodness in a 18" x 18" square. 

This bold black starburst design is hand-felted onto a Cream wool / cashmere blend fabric with a black linen back and matte black button closure. Materials are 100% natural. There are several available for sets, but each one is unique since these are all made by hand and there will be some variances between them. Feather and down inserts included. 

A note on care: these can be hand washed in cool water (air dry flat) or dry cleaned if the occasion requires

name: Thin Line Tech Case
description:
In this very minimal design, a single White line is felted into the base wool & cashmere fabric in Black. As the fibers are added in manually, you end up with a raised, tactile design

Lined with Orange poly, and backed in a Grey wool and cashmere fabric. Trimmed in grosgrain with zipper closure. These are padded to protect your iPad and there's even room for most slim protective skins if you use one. Fits the standard size iPad

Size is 8.5" x 11" x .75"

name: Skull & Antler Mini Tech Case
description:
A creepy-cute icon of a skull with antlers is worked into a base wool and cashmere fabric for the front design of these tech cases. 

Several color combos:
White design on Black
Black design on Toxic Green
White on Grey

Lined with Orange poly, and backed in a Grey wool and cashmere fabric. Trimmed in grosgrain with zipper closure. These are padded to protect your iPad and there's even room for most slim protective skins if you use one. Fits the Mini size iPad & Kindle

Size is 6.75" x 9" x .75"

name: Happy Pill Mini Tech Case
description:
A single, randomly selected 2-color pill is hand-felted in to a soft wool and cashmere fabric in either Dove Grey (Grey back) or Charcoal Grey (Black back). 

Lined with Orange poly, and backed in a Grey wool and cashmere fabric. Trimmed in grosgrain with zipper closure. These are padded to protect your iPad and there's even room for most slim protective skins if you use one. Fits the Mini size iPad & Kindle

Size is 6.75" x 9" x .75"

name: Skull & Antler Tech Case
description:
A creepy-cute icon of a skull with antlers is worked into a base wool and cashmere fabric for the front design of these tech cases. 

Several color combos:
White design on Black
Black design on Toxic Green
White on Grey

Lined with Orange poly, and backed in a Grey wool and cashmere fabric. Trimmed in grosgrain with zipper closure. These are padded to protect your iPad and there's even room for most slim protective skins if you use one. Fits the standard size iPad

Size is 8.5" x 11" x .75"

name: X-Ray Skull Tech Case
description:
Each tiny image of an X-ray of the human skull is hand felted using delicate roving wool fibers onto a wool and cashmere blend fabric, and then framed in an embroidered geometric design.  Since these are created individually, each will be a unique image. 

Lined with Orange poly, and backed in a Black wool and cashmere fabric. Trimmed in Black grosgrain with zipper closure. These are padded to protect your iPad and there's even room for most slim protective skins if you use one. Fits the standard size iPad

* Black & White / White Geomtric Frame
* Red & Grey / Metallic Gold Geometric Frame

Size is roughly 8.5" x 11" x 3/4"

name: Happy Pill Tech Case
description:
A single, randomly selected 2-color pill is hand-felted in to a soft wool and cashmere fabric in either Dove or Charcoal Grey. 

Lined with Orange poly, and backed in a Grey wool and cashmere fabric. Trimmed in grosgrain with zipper closure. These are padded to protect your iPad and there's even room for most slim protective skins if you use one. Fits the standard size iPad

Size is 8.5" x 11" x .75"

name: Moravian Star Mini Tech Case
description:
These padded tech cases have an abstract starburst embedded into the base wool and cashmere fabric, and then a 6 point star is embroidered on top in thread as a final step.

Two color options:
Grey background with Black & White design
Brick background with Grey and Black design

Size is 6.75" x 9" x .75"

Lined with Orange poly, backed in a Grey wool and cashmere fabric. Trimmed in Black grosgrain with zipper closure. These are padded to protect your iPad and there's even room for most slim protective skins if you use one. Fits the mini size iPad & Kindle

name: Moravian Star Tech Case
description:
These padded tech cases have an abstract starburst embedded into the base wool and cashmere fabric, and then a 6 point star is embroidered on top in thread as a final step.

Two color options:
Grey background with Black & White design
Brick background with Grey and Black design

Size is 8.5" x 11" x .75"

Lined with Orange poly, backed in a Grey wool and cashmere fabric. Trimmed in Black grosgrain with zipper closure. These are padded to protect your iPad and there's even room for most slim protective skins if you use one. Fits the standard size iPad

name: X-Ray Skull Mini Tech Case
description:
Each tiny image of an X-ray of the human skull is hand felted using delicate roving wool fibers, working them into a wool and cashmere blend base fabric.  Since these are created individually, each will be a unique image.

Foam padded, lined with Orange poly, and backed in a Black wool and cashmere fabric. Trimmed in Black grosgrain with zipper closure. These are padded to protect your iPad and there's even room for most slim protective skins if you use one. Fits the Mini size iPad & Kindle

Size is roughly 6.75" x 9" x 3/4"

name: Smoke Pillows
description:
These two smoke compositions are both created freehand using both needle and wet felting methods to work White roving wool fibers onto a black wool and cashmere base fabric. The vertical design is a touch more literal than the horizontal design, which is almost abstracted. Each will vary slightly to the next. Back are a black linen held with a single button

Size is 14" x 24" / Feather and down inserts.

Can be hand-washed in cool water, air dry, or dry cleaner if occasion requires.

name: Skull & Bones Tech Case / Mini iPad Case
description:
The very classic skull & bones motif is hand felted onto wool and cashmere base fabric. These are padded to protect your iPad and there's even room for most slim protective skins if you use one. Lined with Orange poly, and backed in a Black wool fabric. Trimmed in Black grosgrain with zipper closure. Fits the Mini iPad as well as the Kindle

Size is roughly 6.75" x 9"

name: Skull & Bones Tech Case / iPad Case
description:
The very classic skull & bones icon is hand felted onto a wool and cashmere base fabric. These are padded to protect your iPad and there's extra room for most slim protective skins if you use one, this fits the standard iPad. Lined with Orange poly on the interior, and backed in a dark grey / black fabric. Trimmed in Black grosgrain and zippered closure

4 Color combos:
White design on Black
White design on Charcoal Grey
Black design on Silvery Green
Rose design on Cool Pink

Size is roughly 8.5" x 11" x 3/4"

name: Skull & Bones Icon Pillow
description:
These classic skull & bones pillows are created by a combination of needle and wet felting methods to imbed the fibers into the base wool and cashmere fabrics. The back is a linen, held with a single button closure. 

12" x 20" rectangular pillow. Insert is a feather / down combo. 

3 Color options:

* Black & Grey with Black Linen Back
* Brown & Brick with Brown Linen Back
* Rose & Pink with Slate Grey Back

name: Modern Rustic Sisal Pendant Light - Small
description:
This small modern rustic pendant light is a white powder-coated wire frame wrapped in sisal twine to create a glowing open pattern, and lamped with an incandescent globe bulb. There is an inline rotary switch included on the white 15' cord. The bottom of the shade is an 8-point scalloped design. 

Outlet plug with swag kit for easy install

Size: 7" Ø x 13" H x 10" Ø

G25 60W Bulb (included)

name: Modern Rustic Sisal Pendant Light - Large
description:
This modern rustic pendant light is a wire frame wrapped in sisal twine to create a glowing open pattern, and lamped with an incandescent globe bulb. There is an inline rotary switch and swag kit. This is not hard-wired, but uses outlet plug for easy install.

Rotary switch 24" from the outlet plug, the 12' cord is fabric wrapped in a bronze color for an antique nod. Has round bottom ring. 

Size: 8" Ø x 12" H x 19" Ø

G40 60W Bulb (included)

name: Long-legged Blackbird Pillow
description:
A single long-leggedy blackbird is felted onto a subtly striped Brick colored wool and cashmere fabric. Each design will be slightly different since these are all made by hand and the design is applied free-hand. The back is a black linen with a single button closure.

I use a combination of needle and wet felting methods to work the design into the base fabric, which is a very labor intensive process and creates a slightly raised design. 

The size is 14” x 14” (33cm) square. Feather and down insert. 

A note on care: the cover can be hand washed in cool water (air dry flat) or dry cleaned if the occasion requires

name: Starburst Carryall Pouch - Large
description:
This little zippered carryall bag has a front starburst design of roving wool felted onto a wool and cashmere fabric. The designs are hand felted onto the base fabric using both needle and wet felting methods to create and slightly raised, tactile design. 

The back is a faux leather. Black grosgrain trim, no interior pocket. 

Size is 6.5" x 9"

name: Kiss Carryall Pouch - Large
description:
A set of Red lips are applied to a Tan wool and cashmere fabric background with some contour shading to give them a bit of 3D effect. Back is a faux Brown and Black leather. 

These designs are applied using a combination of wet and dry felting - a very labor intensive process that is not unlike tattooing the fabric with fibers instead of ink. This results in a slightly raised, tactile design.

Size is 6.5" x 9" with a black zipper

name: Kiss Carryall Pouch - Small
description:
A set of lips are applied to a wool and cashmere fabric background with some contour shading to give them a bit of 3D effect. Back is a faux Black or Brown & Black distressed leather. 

These designs are applied using a combination of wet and dry felting - a very labor intensive process that is not unlike tattooing the fabric with fibers instead of ink. This results in a slightly raised, tactile design.

Size is 4" x 9" with a black zipper

name: Kiss Pillow - 14 x 14
description:
A set of Red lips are felted onto a Tan wool and cashmere fabric background with some contour shading to give them a bit of 3D effect. The back is a Tan linen held with a single button. 

These designs are applied to the fabric using a combination of wet and dry felting - a very labor intensive process that is not unlike tattooing the fabric with fibers instead of ink. This results in a slightly raised, tactile design.

14” x 14” square (35.5 cm)  Feather and down insert

A note on care: these can be hand washed in cool water (air dry flat) or dry cleaned if the occasion require

name: Medic! Carryall Pouch - Large
description:
This little zippered carryall is a perfect place to stash stuff for travel or your purse or desk. It has a signly medic symbol on Red felted to a soft gradient. 

The front is a wool and cashmere Cream and back is a distressed black faux leather. Lined in linen with a black zipper

Sizes is 6.5" x 9"

name: Medic! Carryall Pouch - Small
description:
This little zippered carryall is a perfect place to stash stuff for travel or your purse or desk. It has a signly medic symbol on Red felted to a soft gradient. 

The front is a wool and cashmere Cream and back is a distressed black faux leather. Lined in linen with a black zipper

Sizes is 4" x 9"

name: Happy Pill Carryall Pouch - Small
description:
This little zippered carryall has a soft wool and cashmere front showing a single multicolored pill and is perfect place to stash small items. Each pill is a randomly chosen but brightly colored capsule, and is felted into the base fabric to give it a 3-dimensional look.

Two color options:
Multicolor on Dove grey w/ White faux leather back
Mulitcolor on Charcoal Grey w/ Black faux leather back

Size is 4" x 9".

name: Pelvis & Vertebrae Chair
description:
Another upcycled one-of-a-kind chair in my pelvis series, with an added vertebrae section on the back. Wood is a Rosewood satin finish.

The design is hand felted on double faced Black wool fabric using both needle and wet felting methods. The fibers are deeply embedded on both sides so no worries: they are not going anywhere. The design of woman's pelvis and vertebrae are in shades of white, tan and deep mahogany shades of roving wool. The frame is all hardwood. Black velvet ribbon trim.

These are instructional chairs of sorts, just in case you've never used a chair before. You know those olde timey dance tutorials with the feet? Yeah, like that. 

Size is 41" H x 20" W x 20" D

If you're in the NYC area I can have delivered for a nominal delivery fee - just contact me with details for a quote.

name: Starburst Carryall Pouch - Small
description:
This little zippered carryall bag has a front starburst design of roving wool felted onto a wool and cashmere fabric. The designs are hand felted onto the base fabric using both needle and wet felting methods to create and slightly raised, tactile design. 

The back is a black faux leather. Black grosgrain trim, no interior pocket. 

Size is 4.25" x 9"

name: Pelvis Chair
description:
Using a combination of wet and dry felting, an illustration of a woman's pelvis is applied to double faced Tan wool fabric. This one-of-a-kind upcycled piece has been completely refinished with black stain and varnish, new cushion, and upholstered with one of my custom designs of a woman's pelvis in brown, black, & white shades of roving wool. The frame is all hardwood and has a very handsome back detail. I'm a little bit in love with this one....

These are instructional chairs of sorts, just in case you've never used a chair before. You know those olde timey dance tutorials with the feet? Yes, like that. More of these to come.

Size is 39" H x 25" W x 24" D

If you're in the NYC area I can have delivered for a nominal delivery fee - just contact me with details for a quote.

name: Kiss Chair
description:
Using both needle and wet felting methods, a set of lips in Red, Purple and Light Gray is rendered by hand onto the seat.

Refinished in a decadent metallic Black Cherry finish. One-of-a-kind.

Size is 39" H x 20" W x 21" D

If you're in the NYC area I can have delivered for a nominal delivery fee - just contact me with details for a quote.

name: Skull & Bones Penumbra
description:
This is the classic skull and crossbones motif rendered in a penumbra pattern which I think looks a bit like spray painted graffiti. The Carbon Grey skull & cross bone pattern is applied to a Grey herringbone Wool. The back is a Grey linen with a single button closure. 

These images are applied to the fabric using a combination of wet and dry felting - a very labor intensive process that is not unlike tattooing the fabric with fibers instead of ink. This results in a slightly raised, tactile design.

16" x 16" Square. Feather and down insert

A note on care: cool hand wash and air dry or dry clean if the occasion requires

name: Medic Cross
description:
A classic medical cross is interpreted as an adorable soft pillow. The design has a soft gradation through the center. Good for doctors, nurses or the unusually accident prone. And I suppose if you’re big on geometry and such you can read it as a plus sign too. Call it what you like! These are really soft and tactile and fun to touch

This is a 14” x 14” (35.5cm) square pillow with a feather/down insert. The front is a luxuriously soft wool and cashmere blend fabric, and back is made of Grey Linen with a single button closure.

A note on care: this should be dry cleaned only if the occasion requires
